DataElement.preferredName: Tumor Findings Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Target Percent Change From Baseline Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the tumor findings domain. Indicates the percentage change in target lesion size from Baseline.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tumor Findings Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Target Percent Change From Baseline
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the tumor findings domain._An object fixed as a goal or point of examination; something to point at; a destination.:The value of the last measurement taken divided by the initial value taken at some baseline event or timepoint.
